entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS President Trump I approve of what you have done. I don’t trust Fauci as he is in cohoots with Gates. Be careful. You have a hater in the Coronavirus team! You need to ditch him. The people in the USA are having a tough time . We need another stimulus check! Don’t bail out states
